resources.string: Gives access to more divers, which can be placed on chests to collect treasures in the end of the game.\n1, 2 or 3 divers, depending on the level.
Allows keeping more distinct animals, resulting in more potential points in the end of each round.\n6, 10 or 16 points, depending on the level.
Increases the cards that the player draws.\n2, 3 or 4 cards, depending on the level.
Gives access to more fuel, allowing player to play more cards. Fuel restores in the beginning of each round.\n1, 2 or 3 fuel tokens, depending on the level.
Please select at least one submarine!
In the end of each round the player adds the points shown on the propeller to their score.\n0, 2 or 5 points, depending on the level.
